name: Lion Mount Whistle
description: This whistle will call your courageous lion companion to your side.

name: Skateboard Whistle
description: Riding on this sure beats walking.

name: Owlbear Whistle

name: Surfboard Whistle
description: This whistle will call your gnarly surfboard companion to your side.

name: Magic Sleigh Whistle
description: This whistle will call your flying sleigh companion to your side.

name: Cardboard Box Mount Whistle
description: A mount powered entirely by the most powerful force of them all: your imagination!

name: Fish Mount Whistle
description: This whistle will call a mystical fish mount to whisk you off your feet.

name: Bunnycorn Whistle
description: This whistle will call your fantastical bunnycorn to your side.

name: Strawberry Frosting Whistle
description: This whistle will call your enchantingly sweet cat to your side.

name: Iron Drake Whistle
description: This whistle will call your metal-bound drake to your side.

name: Underworld Goat Whistle
description: This whistle will call your fiendish demonic goat to your side.

name: Teal Bat Mount Whistle
description: This whistle will call a soaring bat to your side.

name: Blue Glow Skateboard Whistle
description: Riding on this sure beats walking.

name: Green Glow Skateboard Whistle
description: Riding on this sure beats walking.

name: Pink Glow Skateboard Whistle
description: Riding on this sure beats walking.

name: Grey Choo Choo Train Mount Whistle
description: This whistle will call a chugging choo choo train to your side.

name: Shadow Rush
description: Tap into your demonic ferocity, increasing your movement speed by 60% for 10 seconds.

name: Miracle
description: Call upon an angelic miracle, restoring 15 Health <color=#39CCFF>plus</color> 15% of your Maximum Health to yourself and nearby players.

name: Elemental Tap
description: Tap into the mana of the earth, restoring 10 Mana <color=#39CCFF>plus</color> 10% of your Maximum Mana to yourself and nearby players.

name: Expert Crafter
description: Your leadership and skills at crafting increase the craft speed of yourself and all players by 20%.

name: Elven Eyes
description: Your elven eyes see much and miss nothing, increasing damage with crossbows by 15%.

name: Primal Nature
description: Your attacks have a chance to restore health. Feel the wild call of battle!

name: Mermaid's Touch
description: Your Mermaid heritage gives you natural fishing skills, increasing the Sweet Spot while landing a fish by 30%.

name: Mithril Key
description: A mithril key crafted especially for the gates in the mines.

name: Lily Honey
description: Honey created from the pollen of lily flowers, it's infused with healing properties.

name: Lotus Honey
description: Honey created from the pollen of lotus flowers, it revitalizes the spirit and restores mana.

name: Golden Milk
description: Liquid gold- literally! This golden product will sell for a high price.

name: Cheesecake
description: Bad for your health, good for your mouth.

name: Cheeseburger
description: It has lettuce on it, so it's healthy. Right?

name: Pizza
description: Legend says that there's no such thing as a bad piece of pizza.

name: Shimmeroot Treat
description: A dessert as decadent as it is expensive.

name: Golden Egg
description: Do you think the yolk is golden, too? This golden animal product will sell for a high price.

name: Tikka Masala
description: Seared vegetables in a searingly spicy sauce, it's quite delicious if you can make it past the heat.

name: Pizza Box
description: This pizza box says it serves 4. Well, all 4 me.

name: Red Carnival Ticket
description: A shiny ticket won at the Withergate carnival! You can exchange these for prizes.

name: Community Token
description: A token proving your contribution to Sun Haven's community. Bernard will trade these for all sorts of amazing things at Town Hall.

name: Darkness Essence
description: A thick droplet of darkness energy. It feels strangely similar to mana, but... somehow twisted and wrong.

name: Mana Shard
description:
A shard of twinkling mana, shed by the Great Tree of Nel'Vari. The members of the Restoration Society would be very interested in this.
"There's memory in mana, the energy that fuels all life." - Nivara

name: Candy Corn Pieces
description: Used as a currency by monsterfolk, accepted at the shops in the Withergate subway. Do you think they grow it on candy farms?

name: Kingly Ticket
description:
A ticket permitting one ride on the Withergate subway train. This kingly ticket is more likely to take you to a large neighborhood.

"We'll just charge a TICKET for the subway! Tickets are the solution to everything! Bwhaha!" - Xyla

name: First Class Ticket
description:
A ticket permitting one ride on the Withergate subway train. This first class ticket is more likely to take you to a medium or large neighborhood.

"We'll just charge a TICKET for the subway! Tickets are the solution to everything! Bwhaha!" - Xyla

name: Economy Ticket
description:
A ticket permitting one ride on the Withergate subway train. This economy ticket is more likely to take you to a small or medium neighborhood.

"We'll just charge a TICKET for the subway! Tickets are the solution to everything! Bwhaha!" - Xyla

name: Spring Token
description: A token of the spring season, these can be traded for wonderful seasonal rewards.

name: Summer Token
description: A token of the summer season, these can be traded for wonderful seasonal rewards.

name: Winter Token
description: A token of the winter season, these can be traded for wonderful seasonal rewards.

name: Fall Token
description: A token of the fall season, these can be traded for wonderful seasonal rewards.

name: Farming Skill Tome
description: A mystical tome imbued with the very essence of farming. Reading its pages will impart increased farming prowess and experience.

name: Exploration Skill Tome
description: A mystical tome imbued with the very essence of exploration. Reading its pages will impart increased exploration prowess and experience.

name: Mining Skill Tome
description: A mystical tome imbued with the very essence of mining. Reading its pages will impart increased mining prowess and experience.

name: Combat Skill Tome
description: A mystical tome imbued with the very essence of combat. Reading its pages will impart increased combat prowess and experience.

name: Fishing Skill Tome
description: A mystical tome imbued with the very essence of fishing. Reading its pages will impart increased fishing prowess and experience.

name: Elixir of Farming
description: An elixir brewed with the essence of cultivation and growth. It expands one's understanding of Farming when consumed.

name: Elixir of Exploration
description: An elixir brewed with the essence of the untamed wilderness. It expands one's understanding of Exploration when consumed.

name: Elixir of Mining
description: An elixir brewed with the essence of the deep earth. It expands one's understanding of Mining when consumed.

name: Elixir of Combat
description: An elixir brewed with the essence of battle and victory. It expands one's understanding of Combat when consumed.

name: Elixir of Fishing
description: An elixir brewed with the essence of patience and fish bait. It expands one's understanding of Fishing when consumed.
